long_description: Thanks to the waterproof warmth of the Black Diamond Vision snow gloves with removable liners, you can hit the slopes ready for a full day of fun. Ripstop nylon with 3-layer waterproof, breathable laminate keeps out snow and wind; leather reinforcement on palms adds durability. High-loft synthetic insulation on palms and backs of hands adds warmth; removable fleece liners offer additional insulation to ensure your hands stay toasty warm. Adjustable wrist straps tighten to seal out water and wind. Closeout.
